20110124172149.000|20110124172149.000|CC1|  you have unusual changes in

20110124172152.000|20110124172155.000|CC1|         young adults.

20110124172155.000|20110124172157.000|CC1|       children under 18.       
20110124172157.000|20110124172157.000|CC1|     People taking MAOIs or     
20110124172157.000|20110124172200.000|CC1|          thioridazine

20110124172203.000|20110124172203.000|CC1|   Taking it with NSAID pain

20110124172207.000|20110124172209.000|CC1|     fatal, were reported.      
20110124172209.000|20110124172209.000|CC1|Signs include abdominal pain and
20110124172209.000|20110124172212.000|CC1| yellowing of the skin or eyes. 
20110124172212.000|20110124172212.000|CC1|Talk with your doctor about your
20110124172212.000|20110124172214.000|CC1|           medicines,
